name: Twigman Adventures Demo (ver. 0.015)
description:
Welcome to the world of Twigman Adventures. This is version 0.015. This is the first patch hosted here on itch.io. I would recommend for both returning and new players to check out the included README file. The README file will go over Controls,  patch changes, future plans for patches, and some neat facts related to development for the game. Alternatively, I just uploaded a DevLog going over the patch notes that you can view here. I will continue to update Twigman Adventures, and, as I do, I will also update this page to reflect on any updates.

For any bugs you may find, feel free to post them on the Twigman Adventures Discord server under the #bugs channel.
